text: Lavia is a municipality in Satakunta, Finland. About 1,900 people lived there in January 2014. The municipalities next to it are Kankaanpää, Kokemäki, Pori, Pomarkku, Sastamala and Ulvila. The designer of Finish Euro coin comes from Lavia. == Other websites == * The official page Category:Municipalities of Satakunta
title: Lavia
